text: 12.10: Fi 2.3; Hi 13.1; 1 Pi 1.22; 2 Pi 1.7Nde guigira wari won ndavir guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨŋri. Nde wari ndavir wo mben nɨɨŋv, guigira mbe vuzvugɨp, kha ndɨkndɨgar mben muuŋri, mbe guigira nde phorge regi ntɨɨri ma. Nde wari mbevav, khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip harigi ntɨɨri zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuari.
